sourcesContent:
<form (submit)="onaddpost(addPost)" #addPost="ngForm">
    <input type="text"
    ngModel name="enteredID"
    placeholder="Post ID"
    required
    minlength="1"
    pattern="^[a-zA-Z0-9\s_-]+$"
    #enteredID="ngModel"/>
    <input type="text"
    ngModel name="enteredName"
    placeholder="Post Name"
    required
    minlength="1"
    pattern="^[a-zA-Z0-9]+$"
    #enteredName="ngModel"/>
    <button type="submit">Add Post</button>
</form>
